question.question: What is the primary purpose of the Allen manoeuvre?
question.option_a: To assess the patency of the coronary arteries
question.option_b: To evaluate the function of the carotid arteries
question.option_c: To check the blood flow in the radial and ulnar arteries
question.option_d: To measure the blood pressure in the femoral artery
